body_html: @mkassner Unfortunately, I could not get permission from the vendors to reveal the devices, as many are unannounced. Keep your eyes open, I expect multiple announcements soon. It's worth the wait; the acceleration is significant.

body: @mkassner Unfortunately, I could not get permission from the vendors to reveal the devices, as many are unannounced.  Keep your eyes open, I expect multiple announcements soon.  It's worth the wait; the acceleration is significant.
